definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become low, be abased (NH, der. spec.; As. šapâlu, der. spec. and deriv.; Sab. [[ספל]] n. humility or lowland DHM:xxix (1875), 604; Ar. safila, safula, safala be low (Lag:BN 48); Aram. [[שְׁפַל]], 4pal (der. spec.));—

all Is: become (be brought, laid) low, of trees Is 10:33 (‖[[גְּדֻעִים ]]), mts. Is 40:4 (opp. [[נִשָּׂא]]), of [[כָּל־נִשָּׂא]] Is 2:12 (but read, for ´[[שׁ]]:, [[נִשְׂגׇּב]] [Kohler], or [[גׇּבׂהַּ]] [Lag], so Du Che:Hpt Di-Kit Marti); fig. be humiliated, of man Is 2:9, Is 5:15, his loftiness Is 2:17, haughty eyes v:Is 2:11 (all ‖[[שָׁחַח ]]), Is 5:15; of city Is 32:19; as helping vb. (= adv.) [[מֵאֶרֶץ]] ´[[וְשׁ]]: [[תְּדַבֵָּרִי]] Is 29:4 thou shalt speak low out of the ground (Ges:§ 120 g; ‖[[מֵעָפָר תִּשַׁח אִמְרָתֵךְ ]]).
[[שְׁפַל־רוּחַ]] Pr 16:9 to be lowly of spirit, so Buhl SS Toy al.; Thes Rob Ges al. sub [[שָׁפָל]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׁפִּיל]] Is 25:12, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשְׁפִּיל]] Ps 75:8, sf. [[יַשְׁפִּילֶנׇּה יַשְׁפִּילָהּ]] Is 26:5 (but 2nd vb. prob. doublet), etc.; Imv. mpl. (sf.) ([[הוּ]])[[הַשְׁפִּילֵ ]] Job 40:11, Je 13:18; Inf. cstr. sf. [[הַשְׁפִּילְךָ]] Pr 25:7 (Ez Eze 21:31 read abs. [[הַשְׁפֵּיל]], ‖[[הַגְבֵּהַּ ]], so Co Krae Ges:§ 113 bb R. 3); Pt. [[מַשְׁפִּיל]] 1Sa 2:7, Ps 147:6; [[מַשְׁפִּילִי]] (Ges:§ 90 l) Ps 113:6;—

usu. fig., ´[[י]]: subj., lay low, tree Ez Eze 17:24 (opp. [[הִגְבַּהְתִּי]]); city Is 26:5 (‖[[הֵשַׁח ]]); fortress Eze 25:12 (+ [[הֵשַׁח]]; Du thinks doublet of Eze 26:5); humiliate pride v:Eze 26:11, Eze 13:11, cf. Job 40:11; obj. [[עֵינַיִם]] [[רָמוֹת]] Ps 18:28, so read also ‖ 2Sa 22:28, [[אַף־מְרוֹמֵם]]´[[מַשׁ]]:´[[י]]: 1Sa 2:7, [[רְשָׁעִים]] Ps 147:6; [[וְזֶה יׇרִים]] ´[[זֶה יַשׁ]]: Ps 75:8, cf. Ez Eze 21:31.
hum. subj. set one in a lower place Pr 25:7; subj. hum. pride Pr 29:23; declar. Is 57:9 thou didst shew abasement [[עַד־שְׁאוֹל]].

as helping vb.: + vb. coörd., [[שֵָׁבוּ]] ´[[הַשׁ]]: Je 13:18 make low, sit down = take a low seat (Ges:§ 120 g); + inf. [[לִרְאוֹת]] ´[[מַשׁ]]: Ps 113:6 he who maketh low to look upon heaven and earth (i.e. ´[[י]]:; ‖[[הַמַּגְבִּיתִי לָשָָׁבֶת ]] v:Ps 113:5; Ges:§ 114 m).—[[הִשְׁפִּילוּ וַתּאׁמֶר גֵּוׇהָ]] Job 22:29 is dub.; ‖[[יוֹשִׁעַ ]] favours [[אֱלוֹהַּ]] as subj., which Bu conj. For ´[[וַתּאׁ]]:, read then [[הִשְׁפִּיל]], ´[[א]]: hath abased pride, so (in part) Du; > they cast (thee) down (RV); men are cast down (´[[הִשׁ]]: intrans.; AV, cf. Lag:BN 121); (thy ways) are brought low (Ew De Di).
